text: Dušan Čkrebić (7 August 1927 - 7 April 2022) was a Serbian politician. He was the Prime Minister of Serbia. He served as minister from 5 May 1984 through 5 May 1986. He was a member of the League of Communists of Yugoslavia. Čkrebić was born in Niš, Serbia. He died on 7 April 2022 in Belgrade, Serbia at the age of 94.Preminuo Dušan Čkrebić, nekadašnji predsednik Predsedništva Srbije ==References== ==Other websites== * Biography of Prime Minister Dušan Čkrebić Category:1927 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Presidents of Serbia Category:Prime ministers of Serbia Category:Yugoslavian communists
title: Dušan Čkrebić
